AzureBlade: Well, I do not know you very well, you see... I can not 
take any chances. We are arriving at the base. We shall see you then.

He transforms near the ground, pieces and dragon limbs moving all over 
to form his robot body. He awaits for Mistra before going to any other 
maximal.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...> wrote:
> Moren had some big eyes "OF COURSE NOT!I WAS ONLY KIDDING CAN'T 
> SEE?!?!" he yelled at Azure
>

> > AzureBlade was thrown back by the reply.
> >

it? 
> > Are you gay?

we

probably

bringing

the

> almost
